mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_emp_mst (CD_EMP, NM_EMP, NO_RESIDENT) VALUES (#{cdEmp}, #{nmEmp}, #{noResident})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hr_emp_mst WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}

SELECT E.*, BD.NM_BANK AS nmBank, BD.TP_BANK AS tpBank, DD.NM_DEPARTMENT AS nmDepartment, PS.NM_POSITION AS nmPosition, PS.SQ_POSITION AS sqPosition, PC.NM_POSITION_CATEGORY AS nmPositionCategory FROM hr_emp_mst E LEFT JOIN bank_data_sdtl BD ON E.CD_BANK = BD.CD_BANK LEFT JOIN department_dtl DD ON E.NO_DEPARTMENT = DD.NO_DEPARTMENT LEFT JOIN position_sdtl PS ON E.NO_POSITION_UNIQUE = PS.NO_POSITION_UNIQUE LEFT JOIN position_category_dtl PC ON PS.NO_POSITION_CATEGORY = PC.NO_POSITION_CATEGORY WHERE E.CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}

SELECT (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM salary_deduction_info WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}) THEN 'salary_deduction_info' ELSE NULL END) AS "급여등록", (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hr_emp_dtl WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}) THEN 'hr_emp_dtl' ELSE NULL END) AS "인사등록", (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hr_contract_info WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp}) THEN 'hr_contract_info' ELSE NULL END) AS "근로계약서"
